context: A series of security alerts were noted, including a suspicious account creation, user and IP address reconnaissance via SMB, and a suspected overpass-the-hash attack involving authentication attempts against VNEVADO-DC.
question: Who was the individual identified as the Helpdesk Administrator attempting to authenticate against VNEVADO-DC during the suspected overpass-the-hash attack (Kerberos)?
solution_steps: A new user account with AadUserId `1d94aaf6-efe6-4e76-ad56-ffd7d1257bc1` was created, which might indicate an attempt to maintain access to the device or organization.
Ethan Brooks (Account Executive) on host `VNEVADO-Win10V` enumerated SMB sessions on host `VNEVADO-DC`, retrieving recent IP addresses of 2 accounts.
Emma Clark (Helpdesk Administrator) on host `VNEVADO-Win10V` attempted to authenticate against host `VNEVADO-DC`, which might indicate a suspected overpass-the-hash attack.
